ground_truth: Lt Dan pushes Forrest away and Forrest steps back as Lt Dan flips back over then pulls himself back up onto his wheelchair and breathes heavily. An anchorman reports in front of the White House. Forrest looks at the fat man on the bus bench. President Nixon holds the plaque and Forrest speaks on the phone then hangs up. President Nixon makes a resignation speech on TV and the television cuts to a shot of President Nixon standing outside. Air Force One with his hands in the peace sign. An officer hands Forrest an envelope and then walks away. Forrest takes his paddle and runs out of the gymnasium. Mrs Gump walks out of the house and smiles as Forrest walks up to the house wearing his uniform. Mrs Gump and Forrest walk into the house where there are stacks of pingpong paddles and lifesized cardboard cutouts of Forrest playing pingpong. Forrest walks up to a shack on the edge of the Bayou as a group of black kids play in the front yard. Bubba's mother Mrs Blue and her other children look at Forrest as he steps over to Bubba's tombstone and pulls out notes from his pocket then walks along a wooden pier.
